name: Blue Lagoon
description: Blue Lagoon is a popular summer cocktail which is prepared from a mixture of vodka, blue curacao and lemonade. It is said to have been invented in the popular New York bar, Harryâ€™s Bar. It is frequently showcased in various popular cultures by featuring in many movies and sitcoms. The drink is served in a highball glass; on the rocks poured over ice with lemon as the common garnish.
